title: Knip executor
description: Run Knip to find unused dependencies, exports, and files

projectRoot.description: The root directory of the project to lint

strict.description: Enable strict mode (implies --production). Verifies workspace dependency isolation, includes peerDependencies when finding unused or unlisted dependencies, and reports type-only imports listed in dependencies.

env.description: Environment variables to set when running knip. Useful for providing dummy values for env vars that would otherwise cause .ts files to throw during knip analysis.
